ygData.subject: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Gladly so too. Its about time quests start giving some exp again, also its around a lvl 25 and up quest so there should be a nice size chunk of exp. Granted
ygData.messageBody:
Gladly so too. Its about time quests start giving some exp again, also its
around a lvl 25 and up quest so there should be a nice size chunk of exp.
Granted you have to cash out like 278 plat for the gems. (for the star rubies).
I only completed the gauntlets portion as of yet but hope that the exp gain is
the same or more for the rest of the items too.

Also anyone wanna sell some good wisdom eq on sol server? Got alot of money to
burn.
